name: rogergs
text: Such a perfect distillation of the 80's school of big-budget video making (Michael Jackson, Lionel Richie, etc.)

name: atmus
text: This is the sort of video Meatloaf would do as well.

name: tragicone
text: hat video set my soul ablaze

name: autrepoupee
text: i pitched this idea to timbaland in 1997

name: magb
text: Fun fact: as of May 12, 2008, the original incarnation of this strip is rated 4.7 (662 voters), while this "rerun" is languishing at a mere 4.1 (388 voters). Someone more pathetic than me can use this information to calculate just how much the Achewood userbase dislikes repeated strips or whatever.

name: decagon
text: The Achewood userbase dislikes repeated strips to a degree of approximately 0.6 points, or precisely "three-fifths," if you will.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Didn't ZZ Top do this exact vid?
